search_hise.description: Search across all HISE documentation: API methods, UI properties, module parameters, and code snippets.

query_ui_property.description: Query UI component properties. Use "Component.property" format (e.g., "ScriptButton.filmstripImage").

query_scripting_api.description: Query Scripting API methods. Use "Namespace.method" format (e.g., "Math.round()", "Knob.setValue()").

query_module_parameter.description: Query module parameter IDs. Use "Module.parameterId" format (e.g., "HardcodedSynth.Gain").

list_snippets.description: List all available code snippets with metadata.

get_snippet.description: Get full details and code for a specific snippet by ID.

list_ui_components.description: List all available UI component types.

list_scripting_namespaces.description: List all available Scripting API namespaces.
